channel.description: Recent content in protein-model on Wang's Blog

item.title: Modeling Protein Structures
item.description: Introduction There are many works for protein modeling regarding proteins as a 1-d sequences. From this perspective, proteins resembles natural languages - amino acides are the language tokens. One huge advantage of such approach is that it enables the easy utilization of the rich existing works for natural language modeling where great success has been achieved in recent years However, proteins have four levels of structure that is essential for their function.
